2.Name: doubleFree
2.Description: Memory pointed to by ptr is freed twice

4.Name: constVariablePointer
4.Description: Variable otr can be declared as pointer to const

5.Name: uninitdata
5.Description: Memory is allocated but not initialized: ptr

6.Name: unreadVariable
6.Description: Variable ptr is assigned a value that is never read

7.Name: eraseIteratorOutOfBoundsCond
7.Description: Either the condition 'iter!=taskList.end()' is redundant or function 'erase()' is called on the iterator 'iter' which is out of bounds.
